trans-unit.source: Provides a type converter that retrieves a list of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref> controls in the current container.
trans-unit.target: 提供類型轉換器，可擷取一份<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>目前容器中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The AssociatedControlConverter class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter> class and provides a type converter specifically for controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class.
trans-unit.target: AssociatedControlConverter 類別衍生自的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter>類別，並提供類型轉換器，特別針對控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter>

trans-unit.source: It is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.AssociatedControlID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
For more information about type converters, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [Generalized Type Conversion](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 實作類型轉換器](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)或[一般化類型轉換](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AssociatedControlConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: **Note** You should never access a type converter directly.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**您應該永遠不會直接存取型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object.
trans-unit.target: 請改為使用中呼叫適當的轉換程式<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>物件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>的範例

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the provided control inherits from <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示提供的控制是否繼承自<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The control instance to test whether it is a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要測試其是否的控制項執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: if the control inherits from the class; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 control 繼承自類別; 否則 。
